Title: Unfolding a new picture
Designer: Jing'an District Cultural Palace (静安区文化宫)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: A worker showing a scale model for a new chemical/industrial installation. The text board in front of the model explains: Smokestack dedusting utilizing flue gas - 烟囱除尘利用烟气.
